testcase.classname: Testcases for checks on the Core Product functionality
testcase.name: TC1-Extract Jacket details from the Shop Menu - #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given User opens the "chrome" and loads the "CP_URL"........................passed When I am on the CP Home Page and do some quick element loaded validations..passed And I navigate to the Shop Menu and select "Men's" category.................passed And I find all "Jackets" from all paginated pages...........................passed Then I store each Price, Title, and Top Seller message of the "Men's" and "Jackets" in a text file.passed And I attach the generated text file to the test report.....................passed

system-out: Given User opens the "edge" and loads the "CP_URL"..........................passed When I am on the CP Home Page and do some quick element loaded validations..passed And I navigate to the three dotted Menu and select "News & Features" category.failed Then I navigate to the News page and count all video feeds ">=" "3".........skipped And I attach the generated text file to the test report.....................skipped
